citations.narrative:
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 12:00pm on 03/29/2016.
APHIS VMO spoke with the attending veterinarian via telephone. The AV stated he was off-site and was unavailable
for an inspection.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 12:00pm on 03/29/2016.
APHIS VMO spoke with the attending veterinarian via telephone. The AV stated he was off-site and was unavailable
for an inspection.
